div.bibl: Norwegian American Technical Journal, January, 1932. p. 5. CHICAGO'S NEW POST-OFFICE BUILDING(Architects: Graham, Anderson Probst, and White.)

body.p: Three members of the Chicago-Norwegian Technical Society, S. E. Naess and Chr. Bagge; architects, and Maynus Geurdersen; chief structural engineer, have taken a prominent part in the planning of the building. Last fall Messrs. Sigurd E. Naess of the above firm (Graham Anderson - Prabst - White) at a meeting of the Chicago Norwegian Technical Society gave an absorbingly interesting talk about the new post-office.
